parts.text:
```json
{
  "trip_summary": {
    "from": "Hokkaido",
    "to": "Taipei",
    "best_travel_options": [
      "Flight from Sapporo (CTS) to Taipei (TPE)"
    ],
    "estimated_budget_range": "$500 - $1500",
    "summary_description": "A trip from Hokkaido to Taipei involves flying from Japan to Taiwan. This trip combines the natural beauty and culinary delights of Hokkaido with the vibrant city life and cultural richness of Taipei.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/hokkaido_taipei.jpg"
  },
  "transportation": [
    {
      "method": "Flight",
      "from": "Sapporo (CTS)",
      "to": "Taipei (TPE)",
      "duration": "4-5 hours",
      "cost_range": "$300 - $1000",
      "booking_link": "https://www.google.com/flights",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/flight_image.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "accommodations": [
    {
      "category": "Budget",
      "name": "Star Hostel Taipei Main Station",
      "price_per_night": "$30",
      "booking_link": "https://www.booking.com/hotel/tw/star-hostel-taipei-main-station.en-gb.html",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/star_hostel.jpg"
    },
    {
      "category": "Mid-Range",
      "name": "Hotel Quote Taipei",
      "price_per_night": "$150",
      "booking_link": "https://www.booking.com/hotel/tw/hotel-quote-taipei.en-gb.html",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/hotel_quote.jpg"
    },
    {
      "category": "Luxury",
      "name": "Mandarin Oriental Taipei",
      "price_per_night": "$400",
      "booking_link": "https://www.booking.com/hotel/tw/mandarin-oriental-taipei.en-gb.html",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/mandarin_oriental.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "attractions": [
    {
      "name": "Taipei 101",
      "description": "Iconic skyscraper with panoramic city views.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Any time, but daytime offers better visibility.",
      "entry_fee": "$20",
      "location": "Xinyi District, Taipei",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/taipei101.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "National Palace Museum",
      "description": "Houses a vast collection of Chinese art and artifacts.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Weekdays to avoid crowds.",
      "entry_fee": "$10",
      "location": "Shilin District, Taipei",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/national_palace_museum.jpg"
    },
    {
      "name": "Shilin Night Market",
      "description": "Famous night market with street food and games.",
      "best_time_to_visit": "Evening.",
      "entry_fee": "Free (food costs vary)",
      "location": "Shilin District, Taipei",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/shilin_night_market.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "food_recommendations": [
    {
      "dish": "Xiao Long Bao (Soup Dumplings)",
      "description": "Delicious steamed dumplings filled with soup and meat.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Din Tai Fung",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/xiao_long_bao.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Beef Noodle Soup",
      "description": "A hearty soup with braised beef and noodles.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Lin Dong Fang Beef Noodles",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/beef_noodle_soup.jpg"
    },
    {
      "dish": "Bubble Tea",
      "description": "Taiwanese tea-based drink with chewy tapioca balls.",
      "best_place_to_try": "Chun Shui Tang",
      "image_url": "https://example.com/bubble_tea.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "travel_tips": [
    "Purchase an EasyCard for convenient travel on public transportation.",
    "Learn a few basic Mandarin phrases.",
    "Bargain at night markets for better deals.",
    "Be aware of the humidity, especially during summer.",
    "Try a traditional Taiwanese massage."
  ]
}
```
